name: Revenger, Raging Form Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC)[Limit-Break 4]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][retire three rear-guards with "Revenger" in their card names], choose up to one "Revenger, Raging Form Dragon" from your hand, ride it as [Stand], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn. [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle. [CONT](VC/RC):Lord (If you have a unit without a same clan as this unit, this unit cannot attack)

name: Revenger, Raging Fall Dragon "Яeverse"
effect: [ACT](VC):[COST][Lock a rear-guard with "Revenger" in its card name], choose three of your units with "Revenger" in their card names, and they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. [AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:This ability's cost is reduced by [Counter-Blast 1] for each of your locked cards. At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 3 & discard three cards from hand], choose up to two of your [Stand] rear-guards, and lock them. Then, if you have two or more locked cards or five cards in your damage zone, [Stand] this unit.

name: Revenger, Dragruler Phantom
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from a unit with "Revenger" in its card name during the ride phase, search your deck for up to one card with "Revenger" in its card name, call it to (RC) and shuffle the deck. If your opponent's damage zone has four or less cards, [COST][Soul-Blast 1] "Illusionary Revenger, Mordred Phantom"], choose one of your opponent's vanguards, and deal one damage. [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose all of your front row "Blaster Dark" and front row units with "Revenger" in their card names, retire all of your other rear-guards, and for each unit retired, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you retired two or more rear-guards, [Stand] all of your front row rear-guards.

name: Revenger, Slay Hex Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding from a unit with "Revenger" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from hand], search your deck for up to one "Revenger, Raging Form Dragon", ride it as [Stand], and shuffle the deck. If you rode a card, choose a "Revenger, Slay Hex Dragon" from your soul, and put it into hand.

name: Dark Cloak Revenger, Tartu
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC) from hand, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one grade 1 or less card with "Revenger" in its card name, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck. At the end of that turn, retire that unit.

name: Revenger, Darkbless Angel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) for the cost of your unit's ability, if you have a grade 3 or greater vanguard with "Revenger" in its card name, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one grade 1 card with "Revenger" in its card name, call it to (RC), and shuffle the deck. At the end of that turn, retire that unit.

name: Wily Revenger, Mana
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), if you have a <Shadow Paladin>  vanguard, search your deck for up to one grade 1 or less card with "Revenger" in its card name, call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit, and shuffle the deck. At the end of that turn, put that unit on the bottom of the deck.

name: Dark Armor Revenger, Rinnal
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit's attack or the attack it boosted hits a vanguard, look at the top three cards of your deck, choose up to one card with "Revenger" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into hand, and put the rest on the bottom of the deck in any order. [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) by your card's ability, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], your opponent chooses one of their rear-guards, and retires it.

name: Self-Control Revenger, Rakia
effect: [AUTO](Soul)[1/turn]:When your grade 3 unit with "Revenger" in its card name is placed by riding from a grade 2, search your deck for up to one grade 1 with "Revenger" in its card name, call it to (RC) as [Rest], and shuffle the deck. [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose a grade 2 with "Revenger" in its card name from your drop, and call it to a (RC) in the same column as this unit.

name: Detecting Revenger, Aife
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][[Rest] this unit], reveal the top five cards of your deck, choose a "Revenger, Raging Form Dragon" from among them, put it into hand, and shuffle the deck. If you did not put it into hand, choose one of your other units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.

name: Crisis Revenger, Fritz
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, draw a card. Then, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 1 or greater, put a Quick Shield ticket into hand.

effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn!
